abilities.name: Incorporeal Movement.
abilities.description: The demon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

abilities.name: Light Sensitivity.
abilities.description: While in bright light, the demon has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

abilities.name: Shadow Stealth.
abilities.description: While in dim light or darkness, the demon can take the Hide action as a bonus action.
